actions.text: Amendment (A001) in the nature of a substitute offered by Mr. Young (AK).
Young (AK) amendment (A001) modified by unanimous consent.
On agreeing to the Young (AK) amendment (A001) as modified Agreed to by voice vote.

description: Amendment in the nature of a substitute provides for the establishment of a pilot project by the Forest Service to implement a science-based fire protection and forest health plan in three National forests in northern California.
purpose: Amendment in the nature of a substitute.
